title: The History of Hayley and Ben
name: The History of Hayley and Ben
description:
A Map by Bposerow

Locations of places special to Hayley and Ben

properties.name: Bought my engagement ring for Hayley bear
properties.description: Posted by Bposerow10 W 47th Street, New York, NYWhere Hayley and I picked out a ring for our engagement. Hayley was able to spot all the defects on the diamonds that she viewed with her naked eye! We picked out the diamond together, but she didn\'t know when I was going to actually propose to her.

properties.name: Carmines - where I first met Hayley's family
properties.description: Posted by Bposerow 2450 Broadway, New York, NYWhere I first met Hayley\'s mother, father, aunt and uncle and Grandma Ida. Ida said later that she knew that night that I was the one that Hayley was going to marry.

properties.name: Gargulios
properties.description: Posted by Bposerow2911 W 15th St, Brooklyn, NYOur first date! Well, I figured sooner or later! I first discovered Hayley\'s aversion to fish!

properties.name: My dive of my first apartment - where I first met Hayley
properties.description: Posted by Bposerow2387 East 4th Street, Brooklyn, NYShe saw my right profile and knew that everything was going to be OK. We had our first kiss in the car a little bit before midnight the night of our first date in front of the apartment. Hayley met the love of her life a few days afterwards, Alex cat!

properties.name: One If By Land, Two if by Sea
properties.description: Posted by Bposerow17 Barrow Street, New York, NYThe second happiest day of my life! I sent flowers to her professor at HUC, so that the professor could give them to her in class. I picked her up in a limousine at HUC. I tried to get WFUV to play a Harry Chapin song while we were in the limousine, but that did not work. We got to the restaurant and took pictures with the limo driver. Then we went into the restaurant. I arranged for a special poem that I had written for her including the line "Will you marry me?" and professionally printed to be included inside her menu. She opened it, and immediately closed it, she was so surprised! Meanwhile, I fumbled for the ring and read another poem to her. Then we called everybody to tell them. When we left the restaurant, I arranged for the pianist to play "You Can\'t Take That Away From Me."

properties.name: Original Federal Reserve Bank location - where I first called Hayley
properties.description: Posted by Bposerow59 Maiden Lane, New York, NY 10045Where I placed my first call to Hayley.

properties.name: Our Wedding
properties.description: Posted by BposerowShore Road, Glenwood Landing, NY 11547It rained in the morning, but the sun came out for our wedding! We started on our wonderful life together! I am my beloved\'s, and my beloved is mine.

properties.name: Our first date movie
properties.description: Posted by Bposerow 1170 Coney Island Ave., Brooklyn, NYWhere we saw the horrible movie "She\'s All That" and where we had to deal with a large number of teenage kids making a lot of noise so we couldn\'t hear the horrible movie. When we were going to the movie, I grabbed her hand and said "Well, I figured sooner or later!"

properties.name: Sattui Winery
properties.description: Posted by Bposerow1111 White Lane, St. Helena, CAOne of our favorite vacations. We went to Sattui Winery and we ate a baguette and cheese in the sun and on this beautiful winery. We have a wonderful picture of the two of us sitting in front of a water fountain. We have a custom of kissing whenever we see a water fountain, because of our kiss on our second date in front of a water fountain.

properties.name: Where I first told Hayley that I loved her
properties.description: Posted by Bposerow300 Avenue X, Brooklyn, NYIt took me a month to say it, but I finally told Hayley that I loved her on March 6, 1999.

properties.name: Where I first told Hayley's parents that I wanted to marry her
properties.description: Posted by Bposerow 503 Rebecca Lane, Oceanside, NYI got over my nervousness and asked Hayley\'s mother and father if I had their permission to marry their daughter. Luckily, they said yes. Then, I couldn\'t keep a straight face when Hayley asked me why it took me so long to come out to her (she was waiting in the car). I eventually broke down and told her.
